sourcesContent:
import i18n from 'i18next';
import { initReactI18next } from 'react-i18next';
import LanguageDetector from 'i18next-browser-languagedetector';

i18n
  .use(LanguageDetector)
  .use(initReactI18next)
  .init({
    fallbackLng: 'sr',
    debug: false,
    interpolation: {
      escapeValue: false,
    },
    resources: {
      sr: {
        translation: {
          title: "MindLoop AI Widget za va≈° sajt",
          subtitle: "Automatizujte komunikaciju sa klijentima uz AI asistenta koji radi 24/7.",
          tryDemo: "Isprobaj demo odmah",
          free: "besplatno",
          navKontakt: "Kontakt",
          benefits: {
            instant: "Instant odgovori",
            smart: "Pametan AI",
            easy: "Laka integracija",
            instantDesc: "Korisnici dobijaju odgovor u sekundi ‚Äì bez ƒçekanja.",
            smartDesc: "Razume pitanja i koristi znanje va≈°e firme.",
            easyDesc: "Dodaje se bez problema na va≈° postojeƒái sajt ‚Äì bez kodiranja.",
          },
          featuresTitle: "Za≈°to AI Asistent:",
          features: [
            "Automatski odgovara na najƒçe≈°ƒáa pitanja",
            "Sistem preporuka",
            "Personalizovan sadr≈æaj za svaku firmu",
            "Ne zahteva dodatni softver ni kodiranje",
            "Lako se integri≈°e na bilo koji sajt",
            "Radi 24/7 bez pauze ili nadzora"
          ],
          aiAssistantTitle: "Za≈°to CopyBot?",
          aiAssistantBullets: [
            " Sve vi≈°e ljudi prelazi iz VK u Telegram, pa za zadr≈æavanje klijenata treba voditi dve mre≈æe paralelno. CopyBot re≈°ava ovu rutinsku muku!",
            " Vi≈°e nema ruƒçnog kopiranja ‚Äì bot sam objavljuje postove, poveƒáava dohvat i anga≈æovanje!",
            " Potpuna kontrola ‚Äì uvek mo≈æete iskljuƒçiti autoposting ili dodati nove kanale!",
            " Podr≈æava sve vrste sadr≈æaja ‚Äì fotografije, video, tekst, ankete, klipove ‚Äì u bilo kojoj kombinaciji!",
            " ≈†tedi vreme i novac ‚Äì znatno je jeftinije nego anga≈æovati osobu, a CopyBot delimiƒçno radi posao SMM struƒçnjaka!",
            " Isprobajte CopyBot potpuno besplatno tokom jedne nedelje ‚ûî @vkcopybot"
          ],
          forWhom: "Za koga je MindLoop AI?",
          sectors: "Savr≈°eno re≈°enje za sve sektore sa ƒçestim pitanjima korisnika.",
          sectorsList: [
            "Turizam", "Rent-a-car", "Edukacija", "E-commerce", "Dostava", "IT servisi"
          ],
          footerEmail: "Email",
          footerPhone: "Telefon",
        },
      },
      en: {
        translation: {
          title: "MindLoop AI Widget for Your Website",
          subtitle: "Automate client communication with an AI assistant that works 24/7.",
          tryDemo: "Try the demo now",
          free: "free",
          navKontakt: "Contact",
          benefits: {
            instant: "Instant answers",
            smart: "Smart AI",
            easy: "Easy integration",
            instantDesc: "Clients get answers in seconds ‚Äì no waiting.",
            smartDesc: "Understands questions and uses your business data.",
            easyDesc: "Easily added to your existing website ‚Äì no coding required.",
          },
          featuresTitle: "Why our ChatBot:",
          features: [
            "Automatically answers common questions",
            "Recommending system",
            "Personalized content for every company",
            "No extra software or coding needed",
            "Easily integrates with any website",
            "Works 24/7 without breaks or supervision"
          ],
          aiAssistantTitle: "Why CopyBot?",
          aiAssistantBullets: [
            "‚ö° More people are moving from VK to Telegram, and managing two networks at once creates a lot of repetitive work. CopyBot solves this!",
            "‚úî No more manual copying ‚Äì the bot automatically publishes posts, boosting reach and engagement!",
            "‚úî Full control ‚Äì you can disable autoposting or add new channels anytime!",
            "‚úî Supports all types of content ‚Äì photos, videos, text, polls, clips ‚Äì in any combination!",
            "‚úî Saves time and money ‚Äì cheaper than hiring someone and partially replaces an SMM specialist!",
            "üî• Try CopyBot free for one week ‚ûî @vkcopybot"
          ],
          forWhom: "Who is MindLoop AI for?",
          sectors: "Perfect for any sector with frequent customer questions.",
          sectorsList: [
            "Tourism", "Car rental", "Education", "E-commerce", "Delivery", "IT services"
          ],
          footerEmail: "Email",
          footerPhone: "Phone",
        },
      },
      fr: {
        translation: {
          title: "Widget MindLoop AI pour votre site",
          subtitle: "Automatisez la communication client avec un assistant IA disponible 24h/24.",
          tryDemo: "Essayez la d√©mo",
          free: "gratuit",
          navKontakt: "Contact",
          benefits: {
            instant: "R√©ponses instantan√©es",
            smart: "IA intelligente",
            easy: "Int√©gration facile",
            instantDesc: "Les clients obtiennent une r√©ponse imm√©diate.",
            smartDesc: "Comprend les questions et utilise vos donn√©es.",
            easyDesc: "Ajout√© facilement √† votre site existant ‚Äì sans code.",
          },
          featuresTitle: "Pourquoi notre ChatBot :",
          features: [
            "R√©pond automatiquement aux questions fr√©quentes",
            "Syst√®me de recommandation",
            "Contenu personnalis√© pour chaque entreprise",
            "Aucun logiciel ou codage requis",
            "S'int√®gre facilement √† tout site Web",
            "Fonctionne 24h/24 sans interruption"
          ],
          aiAssistantTitle: "Pourquoi CopyBot ?",
          aiAssistantBullets: [
            "‚ö° De plus en plus de personnes passent de VK √† Telegram, ce qui cr√©e beaucoup de travail r√©p√©titif. CopyBot r√©sout ce probl√®me !",
            "‚úî Plus besoin de copier manuellement ‚Äì le bot publie automatiquement les posts en augmentant la port√©e et l'engagement !",
            "‚úî Contr√¥le total ‚Äì vous pouvez d√©sactiver l'autoposting ou ajouter de nouveaux canaux √† tout moment !",
            "‚úî Prend en charge tout type de contenu ‚Äì photos, vid√©os, textes, sondages, clips ‚Äì dans n'importe quelle combinaison !",
            "‚úî √âconomise du temps et de l'argent ‚Äì moins cher que d'engager quelqu'un, et remplace partiellement un sp√©cialiste SMM !",
            "üî• Essayez CopyBot gratuitement pendant une semaine ‚ûî @vkcopybot"
          ],
          forWhom: "√Ä qui s'adresse MindLoop AI ?",
          sectors: "Parfait pour tous les secteurs avec des questions fr√©quentes.",
          sectorsList: [
            "Tourisme", "Location de voiture", "√âducation", "E-commerce", "Livraison", "Services informatiques"
          ],
          footerEmail: "Email",
          footerPhone: "T√©l√©phone",
        },
      },
      ru: {
        translation: {
          title: "–í–∏–¥–∂–µ—Ç MindLoop AI –¥–ª—è –≤–∞—à–µ–≥–æ —Å–∞–π—Ç–∞",
          subtitle: "–ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–π—Ç–µ –æ–±—â–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏ —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é –ò–ò-–∞—Å—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ 24/7.",
          tryDemo: "–ü–æ–ø—Ä–æ–±–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –¥–µ–º–æ",
          free: "–±–µ—Å–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω–æ",
          navKontakt: "–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç",
          benefits: {
            instant: "–ú–≥–Ω–æ–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—ã",
            smart: "–£–º–Ω—ã–π –ò–ò",
            easy: "–õ—ë–≥–∫–∞—è –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è",
            instantDesc: "–û—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—ã –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º –∑–∞ —Å–µ–∫—É–Ω–¥—ã ‚Äì –±–µ–∑ –æ–∂–∏–¥–∞–Ω–∏—è.",
            smartDesc: "–ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç –≤–æ–ø—Ä–æ—Å—ã –∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ—Ç –≤–∞—à—É –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—é.",
            easyDesc: "–õ–µ–≥–∫–æ –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –Ω–∞ —Å–∞–π—Ç ‚Äì –±–µ–∑ –∫–æ–¥–∞.",
          },
          featuresTitle: "–ü–æ—á–µ–º—É –Ω–∞—à ChatBot:",
          features: [
